segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a stool that doesn't look very stable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement in her eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still by the sink, not noticing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she will turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, making the floor slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids don't slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really focused on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are both being very sneaky and quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears if they're not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
